title: bitcoinbring
author: bitcoinbring
content: Just looking over their history and looks very interesting. They apparently launched AVAX, but how have their other offering fared? Would love to hear feedback from people who participated in their IEOs.

comments.author: TastyChillySauce00
comments.body: Quote from: bitcoinbring on January 29, 2023, 01:53:45 PMJust looking over their history and looks very interesting. They apparently launched AVAX, but how have their other offering fared? Would love to hear feedback from people who participated in their IEOs.Garbage exchange site. Bkex may close your account anytime. Please, participate in IEO that will be launched on these exchange sites https://cryptorank.io/ieo-platforms-roi Bkex has a very bad IEO roi. Bkex's volume was unreal. it was having so many fake volume. I have ever seen IEO that launched on bkex called amepay which has become shit token right now. Stay away from bkex if you are still care with your money. Kucoin is far better than bkex.

comments.author: SafuBTC
comments.body: Binance is the safes place for IEO launch pads,Â  apart from this Binance exchange also has the highest successful rate of new projects over other exchanges, unless you want a crypto launchpad instead like Seedify and Maker Dao. In this case always go for the best.

comments.author: Blitzboy
comments.body: https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges/You can use this link to estimate which exchange is good for IEO. In my opinion, BKEX is not a good platform but during the uptrend, they do add a lot of shitcoin, luring newbie to their exchange and then doing suspicious stuffsQuote from: aubert on January 29, 2023, 04:50:59 PMKucoin is far better than bkex. Kucoin is definitely an awesome exchange. I still have more than $400 on their exchange. Their withdrawal process is extremely fast and convenient

comments.author: Oneandpure
comments.body: Seems right now is not moment for joining any IEO whatever exchange listing due have been over from last several years with IEO project, but little risk with your recommended about IEO tokens listing or launched on BKEX. Usually I joined with IEO listed on Binance as launchpad and never interested for other exchange market listing IEO tokens.Better check how reputation from BKEX exchange right now and looking on current IEO have been listing there are any success token or not, I don't know still potential or not for joining any new IEO token actually listing on BKEX are not really popular exchange market. For token sold could be manipulated and be careful if you are interested for IEO on BKEX.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: bitcoinbring on January 29, 2023, 01:53:45 PMJust looking over their history and looks very interesting. They apparently launched AVAX, but how have their other offering fared? Would love to hear feedback from people who participated in their IEOs.Launched AVAX? Im not sure if they did cause the avalanche project has a public sale done on a different platform. They dont even did an IEO with popular market such as Binance, hence it would be impossible for BKEX to did one.IEO is good and has potential to earn profits from early price participation but since we are in a bear situation, its not good to launch any. Even Binance launchpad are not doing a high performance for their recent IEO.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: Quote from: bitcoinbring on January 29, 2023, 01:53:45 PMJust looking over their history and looks very interesting. They apparently launched AVAX, but how have their other offering fared? Would love to hear feedback from people who participated in their IEOs.AVAX (i.e. Avalanche) was launching on Tokensoft. It was not launching on BKEX, much less in IEO format. BKEX does not look like absolute garbage, maybe there will be some good growth that can rewrite ATH. Although the exchange itself does not inspire confidence and I would not send money there. In any case, the best IEOs go to Binance, Bybit, Kucoin.

comments.author: WalkerIVIV
comments.body: if it's IEO the reliability of the exchange it self matters most you should just invest in IEO coming from reputed exchange by then you'll at least avoid the chance of rugpulls.just invest in IEO platforms that's already popular since back then, there's no point in being called IEO if the platform itself isn't really good enough and trusted enough in giving review towards the projects and as a result, you'll get shitty projects that try grabbing money through IEO.

comments.author: lobo13hf
comments.body: according to many statements it seemed that this platform wasn't good enough to held an IEO, even I do rarely heard IEO coming from this platform despite knowing that this platform exists for long, back then when the IEO trend was fire, I recalled some various exchanges offering IEO for the sake of trend ended up becoming some shit coins, so If you really want safe investments in IEO I guess Binance and similar famous platform still good choice.

comments.author: GreatArkansas
comments.body: This is my first time hearing BKEX, lol.They are not really a big player in terms of Initial Exchange Offering (IEO).With this kind of exchange, I indeed don't trust them. Especially their trading volume is not that huge compared to some popular exchanges like Binance and Kucoin.Be aware also to some exchanges because it's already proven that there are some exchange who are manipulating the IEO for their own good.
